name: Neon CGTD
description:
Neon CGTD is a card game tower defense where you must protect your base from being destroyed. To do this, play cards to place different towers to defeat the incoming enemies. You must be quick though, as your hand of cards will be constantly changing. In between levels, you will also have the option to draft more cards into your deck, giving you more options in your defense.  How long will your base survive?

Controls:

Left Mouse: Select cards and place down towers

Right Mouse: Cancel selection

This game was made for Ludum Dare 51: Every 10 Seconds

A game by: MiltonNH25
